div1.p: Norton requests a photograph of Jesse Lazear.

div1.head: Letter from Rupert Norton to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, January 28, 1914
div1.opener:
FORM 135-10,000-10-4-12
THE JOHNS HOPKINS HOSPITAL
WINFORD H. SMITH, M. D.
SUPERINTENDENT
RUPERT NORTON, M. D.
ASST. SUPERINTENDENT
Baltimore, {Jan. 28, 1914. 191}
Mrs. Switzer,
Windsor Hills,
Baltimore.
Dear Madam:-
div1.p:
The enclosed letter was received some days ago. I have
secured your address from Dr. W. S. Thayer and take the liberty of
enclosing the letter to you to do with what you will. I do not know
whether Mrs. Lazear is living with you or not, or I would send the
letter direct to her. Perhaps you will have the kindness, if you
have not yourself a portrait of your son-in-law, to forward the
letter to her.
